alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 1:05PM EDT until June 27 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 103 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Strasburg to Smithville to Holtwood to Delta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Willow Street, New Holland, Paradise, Strasburg, Quarryville, Gap, Delta, Wakefield, Churchtown, Smithville, Holtwood and Susquehanna Trails. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike near mile marker 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail and damaging winds and frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
